00011 double Coord::sqrTorusDist(const Coord& b, const Coord& playgroundSize) const {
00012 
00013     double xDist = fabs(x - b.x);
00014     double yDist = fabs(y - b.y);
00015     double zDist = fabs(z - b.z);
00016 
00017     
00018     /*
00019      * on a torus the end and the begin of the axes are connected so you
00020      * get a circle. On a circle the distance between two points can't be greater
00021      * than half of the circumference.
00022      * If the normal distance between two points on one axis is bigger than
00023      * half of the playground there must be a "shorter way" over the playground
00024      * border on this axis
00025      */
00026     if(xDist * 2.0 > playgroundSize.x)
00027     {
00028         xDist = playgroundSize.x - xDist;
00029     }
00030     //same for y- and z-coordinate
00031     if(yDist * 2.0 > playgroundSize.y)
00032     {
00033       yDist = playgroundSize.y - yDist;
00034     }
00035     if(zDist * 2.0 > playgroundSize.z)
00036     {
00037       zDist = playgroundSize.z - zDist;
00038     }
00039     return xDist * xDist + yDist * yDist + zDist * zDist;
00040 }
